org.openimaj.image.processing.face.recognition.benchmarking

Class CrossValidationBenchmark<PERSON,IMAGE extends Image<?,IMAGE>,FACE extends DetectedFace>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.face.recognition.benchmarking.CrossValidationBenchmark<PERSON,IMAGE,FACE>
  • Type Parameters:
    PERSON - type representing a person or class
    IMAGE - type of image containing the face of each person
    FACE - type of DetectedFace
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RunnableExperiment

    @Experiment(author="Jonathon Hare",
            dateCreated="2012-07-26",
            description="Face recognition cross validation experiment")
public class CrossValidationBenchmark<PERSON,IMAGE extends Image<?,IMAGE>,FACE extends DetectedFace>
extends Object
implements RunnableExperiment
    An RunnableExperiment for performing cross-validation experiments on face recognisers & classifiers.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • finish

        public void finish(ExperimentContext context)
        Description copied from interface: RunnableExperiment
        Finalise the experiment, possibly writing the results, cleaning up, etc. The context gathered by the ExperimentRunner is provided so that RunnableExperiment implementations can access information for generating their reports.

        Note that at the point the context is provided, it is not "locked" and is still recording. The ExperimentRunner returns a completed locked context after the experiment has been completely run.

        Specified by:
        finish in interface RunnableExperiment
        Parameters:
        context - the context provided by the ExperimentRunner
